item.title: firebuild rootfs - gRPC with mTLS
item.description: the problem Currently, when a rootfs is built, the guest is started with an SSH server and the bootstrap process executes via an SSH connection. I don’t like this and want to replace the SSH method with an MMDS based solution. MMDS is already present in the firebuild run command. run uses the vminit component from firebuild-mmds. When the guest starts, the vminit guest service connects to the MMDS endpoint, downloads the metadata and configures the VM.
